about_the_game:
Survive public transportation and escape Hell in HELLEVATORS, a fluid and challenging 2D-platformer action-roguelike.

BLAST YOUR WAY OUT OF HELL
play a freshly deceased spirit accidentally sent to Hell due to a clerical error in the celestial bureaucracy. All you have to do to claim your rightful place in heaven is physically get there, a task easier said than done when all your fellow commuters are after your soul. With an arsenal of spectral weapons, you just might make it.

INVEST IN YOURSELF
Earn a fortune and spend it on tons of weapons and assorted passive knick-knacks to grow stronger and stronger as you approach your destination.

MAKE FRIENDS
Befriend local weirdos for their help on your journey. Offer friendly advice and assistance; they'll pay you back with permanent buffs that persist between runs.

name: HELLEVATORS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% Directx9.0c compatible sound card and drivers

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: Jump dash, slide, and BLAST your way through Hell's deadly public transit system in this fluid, challenging 2D-platformer Action-roguelike. Make friends with weirdos, amass a horde of mystical knick-knacks, and get frighteningly rich as you battle your way to the surface.
